<parameter name="reportDefName" isForPrompting="false" class="java.lang.String"/> <parameter name="whereClause" isForPrompting="true" class="java.lang.String"> <defaultValueExpression ><![CDATA[""]]></defaultValueExpression> </parameter> <queryString><![CDATA[select identity_name as identity, source_application as application, target, action, result, time_stamp from spt_application_activity aa, spt_identity i, spt_application a where a.name = aa.source_application and i.name = aa.identity_name $P!{whereClause} order by identity_name, time_stamp]]></queryString>
